page.title: 13VILLAGE ACTIVITIES
page.content: AFTER CARE GROUP; BROWNIES; CHURCHES: METHODIST;CONGREAGATIONAL;C OF E DOG TRAINING; GARDEN SHOW;GUIDES; HEAVY HORSE SHOW; LADIES KEEP FIT; LORDS MEADOW RESIDENTS ASSOCATION; NUCLEAR ENERGY COMMITEE; PLAY GROUP; SPORTS CLUB; SPORTS FOR ALL. FOR A SMALL VILLAGE TREGONY HAS A FAIR NUMBER OF ACTIVITIES BY LOCAL STANDARDS. THE DOG TRAINING CLUB MEET EVERY WEDNESDAY IN THE VILLAGE HALL.THEY HAVE BEEN RUNNING FOR 5 YEARS AND ORGANISE SHOWS IN VARIOUD PLACES. THE AFTER CARE GROUP SUPPORT PEOPLE AND FAMILIES WHO ARE CANCER VICTIMS. THE GIRL GUIDES MEET WEEKLY IN THE CHURCH HALL ON TUESDAYS FROM 7.30-9.00 .THE SPORTS CLUB RUNS CRICKET AND FOOT BALL TEAMS IN THE APPROPRIATE SEASON AND ALSO ORGANISES THE CARNIVAL EACH YEAR.
